mapper.select: select a.menu_id, b.menu_name, b.menu_icon, ifnull(b.menu_url, '') as menu_url, b.parent_id, case b.parent_id when '' then (select count(*) from sys_menu t where t.parent_id = a.menu_id) end as cnt from sys_group_menu a join sys_menu b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id where a.group_id = #{group_id}
